msbt.message: Actually, I'm right in the middle of somethin' with right now.I'll catch up with you later. Alright, ?
Oh, sorry, I'm playin' this treasure hunt game with right now.I'll be free once we finish, so come get at me then, !
Uhcan this wait until I finish my treasure hunt thing with ?We're kinda in the middle of playing right now, so your stuff might have to wait a bit, . Sorry.
Where's the treasure? My lips are sealed!
I'll tell you where the treasure's NOTis in my pockets! You gotta try harder than that, !
You got me. I never buried the treasure. C'mon, what do you take me for? Get huntin', !
